alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT CACHE...EASTERN BOX ELDER AND NORTHWESTERN RICH COUNTIES... At 258 PM MST...A snow squall was along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Thatcher to 17 miles southeast of Park Valley...and moving southeast at 45 mph. Locations impacted include... Logan, Brigham City, Tremonton, Snowville, Cache, Smithfield, Hyrum, Perry, Wellsville, Lewiston, Bear River City, Corinne, Clarkston, Garden City, Trenton, Plymouth, Howell, Benson, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway and Bear Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 361 and 400. Interstate 84 between mile markers 0 and 42. US Route 89 between mile markers 459 and 502. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 77 and 116. * strong winds in excess of 45 mph are possible with this squall. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this squall. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to produce hazardous driving conditions. Travel is not advised during this snow squall. If you are traveling and encounter adverse winter driving conditions, reduce speed and make sure headlights are on to increase the visibility of your vehicle to those around you.
